meanings.sent1: The small bush was the hedgiest plant in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The tall fence was the hedgiest one on the street.
meanings.sent3: The hedgehog tried to be the hedgiest in the animal parade.
meanings.sent4: Among the group of bushes, the rose bush stood out as the hedgiest.
meanings.sent5: The thorny bush was the hedgiest of them all, making it hard to pass through.

meanings.sent1: The large hedge was the hedgiest barrier in the entire yard.
meanings.sent2: The dense hedge was the hedgiest of all the garden boundaries.
meanings.sent3: The hedgehog felt proud to live near the hedgiest hedge in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The ancient hedge was the hedgiest, standing tall for generations.
meanings.sent5: The perfectly trimmed hedge was the hedgiest sight in the park, attracting many visitors.
